#labels ManualAssessment,Tool
= Introduction =

Manual assessment involve human assessors.  First, all the prospective anchors and the corresponding links will be pooled.  Then an assessor will inspect each anchor and its corresponding prospective links, accepting or rejecting them one by one. 

To have efficient and proper assessment, a GUI tool is provided for this purpose. A snapshot of the manual assessment tool is shown as follows:

https://crosslink.googlecode.com/svn/files/manual_assessment_tool_in_progress_chinese-to-english.png
